description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Mobile Broadband Driver denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-43538):

1. Download and install the following updates for your respective Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)

2. Ensure that your system is fully updated by allowing Windows Update to apply all necessary changes.

**Details**:
These updates are crucial to address the security issue related to improper input validation and out-of-bounds reading. Failure to apply them may leave your system at risk of denial-of-service conditions.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your device matches the specified build numbers for the updates listed above.
- Backup your data before proceeding with the installation of the updates.
